document_data.name: Pampered Traveler
document_data.mainbody:
'''The Pampered Traveler''' was an inn in [[Waterdeep]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. The inn was found on the [[Street of Bells]], on the northeast corner with [[Selduth Street]].

It was a fine establishment with large, well-furnished rooms, a play area for children, and a library that guests could peruse.
